text: Fudbalski klub Ozren Petrovo (Serbian Cyrillic: Фудбалски клуб Oзpeн Пeтpoвo) is a football club based in Petrovo, Republika Srpska, Bosnia and Herzegovina. It currently plays in the Second League of the Republika Srpska. ==External links== * Club at BiHsoccer. Category:Football clubs in Republika Srpska Category:Football clubs in Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: FK Ozren Petrovo
